title: Beside A Crumbling Iraq, Iran Looks On With Alarm Bells Ringing
teaser: With Sunni militants proclaiming a new Islamic caliphate including northern Syria and much of Iraq, Iran is searching for solutions to the looming threat next door. It's taking an active approach to bolster Shiites against the Sunni spread.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
